entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY THIS EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
LOWS AROUND 40

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
